note:
My name is William Fox I am a poet I write under thelovepoet on 2 poetry sites I've been blocked on
fb for years and haven't been on social media for awhile now I want to do it again this looks like a fine place for doing it. I write all kinds of things I
will try different ones out and see how it goes it may take me awhile to learn how this works I mean posting and all but I will be oK...glad to meet everyone I will get a picture up very soon maybe next time I come on thanks thelovepoet
